title: Remote Sales Manager – Digital Advertising
job_overview:
Job Overview:
We are a growing digital advertising agency looking for a results-driven Sales Manager to lead and support our remote sales team. You’ll be responsible for monitoring KPIs, coaching sales associates, and making sure the team consistently hits monthly sales targets. This role is perfect for someone with a background in digital marketing, online media sales, or guest post/native advertising.

Track and review sales associates’ daily and weekly performance
Provide regular coaching and support to improve conversions and outreach quality
Ensure the team achieves monthly sales goals
Review and refine sales processes and outreach strategies
